title: RIOT logic: Garen punching the enemy when he crits makes no sense cause he has a sword
body:
Lets make Sion kick the enemy when he crits, even thought the has a big as fuck axe. 

Seriously, as a Garen player that really annoys me, why was Garens epic fist to the face punch removed with such a lame excuse and then another champion basicly gets an identical unlogical crit animation?
